document.full_text: twitter has made an offer to acquire tweetdeck, a popular third-party software application for using internet social networking services, for up to $50 million, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.
document.title: twitter seeks to buy tweetdeck for up to $50 million
lines_and_colors: twitter has made an offer to acquire tweetdeck, a popular third-party software application for using internet social networking services, for up to $50 million, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.
